courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Admission into the Doctor of Musical Arts choral music program, or the equivalent background in other doctoral programs.
description: Study of performance problems and musical analysis of choral music with techniques of preparation and rehearsal from the various style periods: Renaissance, Baroque, Classic-Romantic, and Contemporary. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Admission into the Doctor of Musical Arts choral music program, or the equivalent background in other doctoral programs.
label: Adv Choral Perform Techniques
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Music department.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Choral Music concentration(s). Restricted to Graduate - Urbana-Champaign.
